mapper.insert: insert into reservation (reservation_no, reservation_employee, reservation_date, return_date, reservation_status, reservation_content, product_no) values (null, #{reservationEmployee}, #{reservationDate}, #{returnDate}, 1, #{reservationContent}, #{reservationProduct.productNo});
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM reservation R INNER JOIN `product` P ON `R`.`product_no` = `P`.`product_no` where reservation_no = #{reservationNo};
